hero.name: Gerónimo Molero Rodríguez
hero.intro: Passionate about technology and learning, with a unique journey from biology to creating innovative digital solutions.

aboutMe.intro: My professional journey started in Biology, but my curiosity for technology and how things work led me to discover my true passion: software development. This transition has shaped in me a strong capacity for learning and a problem-solving mindset that I apply in every project.
aboutMe.teamwork: I am an assertive developer with strong teamwork skills, always looking for the best solutions to problems and enjoying the collaborative process. Currently, I am focused on mastering the .NET and JavaScript ecosystem, building robust and efficient web applications.

contact.intro: If you're interested in collaborating or just want to chat, don't hesitate to contact me!

tasks: Developed an internal tool for data management using .NET and C#.
Collaborated in maintaining and improving the company's main web application.
Worked with SQL Server for database management.
